properties.areaDesc: McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Caldwell Mountains; Avery; Yancey; Burke Mountains
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 5 at 11:32PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
Northwest winds of 30 to 40 mph, with occasional gusts of 45 to 55
mph at times, will impact the higher ridge top locations along
the northern Blue Ridge Mountains of western North Carolina early
this morning. The strongest winds will affect mainly elevations
above 4500 feet, but with a few gusts above 40 mph impacting the
rest of the northern mountains at elevations above 3500 feet.

High profile vehicles may have difficulty with these winds in and
near mountain passes. Scattered power outages could also occur in
the high elevation communities.

NWSheadline: VERY WINDY CONDITIONS ALONG THE HIGHER RIDGE TOPS OF THE NORTHERN BLUE RIDGE MOUNTAINS EARLY THIS MORNING
